name: Barter in Blood with Skip / Restart
name_original: Barter in Blood with Skip / Restart
description:
This is a post ludum dare update to the Barter in Blood game. The new features added are  pressing “Enter” will skip through the intro and the game automatically restarts when you die. These features are solely to help you play the game without going through the intro every time and should not be a factor in the rating of the game. If this is against the rules, I’ll take it down. 

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to Move, Z or Enter to Shoot. Enter to skip the Intro.
